SchemeName: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Fellowship Programme
Benefits: Rs. 65,000/- per month as a fellowship
Beneficiary can file grievance against government services
All filed grievances will be resolved in 30 days
Website: Tamil Nadu Makkaludan Mudhalvar Scheme Website
HowToApply: By Visiting Makkaludan Mudhalvar Scheme Camp Location

SchemeName: Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Higher Education Assurance Scheme
Benefits: Financial Assistance to meet the cost of education
AmountOfAssistance: Rs. 1,000/- per month till the completion of the course
NodalAgency: Department of Social Welfare and Women Empowerment, Tamil Nadu
ModeOfApply: Through Moovalur Ramamirtham Ammaiyar Education Assurance Scheme Application Form

SchemeName: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Breakfast Scheme
Benefits: Nutritious Breakfast will be Provided to Primary School Students
Beneficiaries: Primary School Students of Tamil Nadu
NodalDepartment: Department of Social Welfare & Women Empowerment, Tamil Nadu Government
